generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.slime Attack Entity
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Causes the entity to grow tired every once in a while, while attacking.

fields.title: Set Persistent
fields.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player Default value: false.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: During attack behavior, this multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving toward the target. Default value: 1.

fields.title: x Max Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target. Default value: 10.

fields.title: y Max Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target. Default value: 10.
